display.title: Tutorialised
description: New to this updated pack is a &&dGuides + More&&r section. The information inside is available to view at any time, but whenever it becomes relevant, you will be &&6directed towards it&&r for some light reading.
The information found inside may interest you if you would like &&amore of an insight&&r into some of &&bGTCEu's mechanics&&r - and in some cases, is absolutely indispensable.
Quests that unlock a tutorial node will have an &&6orange-ish descriptor&&r at the bottom of the quest description.

subtitle.text: Tips and tricks to help you prosper
